//src/Components/StudentTableRow.js
import React from"react";import{Button}from"react-bootstrap";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StudentTableRow=props=>{const{_id,name,email,rollno}=props.obj;const deleteStudent=()=>{axios.delete("http://localhost:4000/students/students/"+_id).then(res=>{if(res.status===200){alert("Student successfully deleted");window.location.reload();}else Promise.reject();}).catch(err=>alert("Something went wrong "+err));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:rollno}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"edit-link",to:"/edit-student/"+_id,children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:deleteStudent,size:"sm",variant:"danger",children:"Delete"})]})]});};export default StudentTableRow;
